# Idrettsbarna (Lær å Svømme) - AI Context File

## Identity & Core Value
**Name:** Idrettsbarna (Brand: "Lær å svømme")
**Location:** Asker, Norway (Risenga Svømmehall)
**Main Service:** Swimming courses for babies, toddlers, and children.
**Key Selling Point:** Warm water (34°C), experienced instructors, small groups, and focus on safety/mastery, not performance pressure.

## Direct Links (Navigation)
- **Home:** https://www.læråsvømme.no/
- **Babysvømming Asker:** https://www.læråsvømme.no/babysvomming-asker
- **Svømmekurs Barn:** https://www.læråsvømme.no/svommekurs-asker
- **Kontakt:** https://www.læråsvømme.no/#contact

## Courses & Pricing (Spring 2026)

### Babysvømming (3 mnd - 2 år)
- **Goal:** Water habituation, diving reflex, parent-child bonding.
- **Price:** 4255 NOK for full semester (approx. 23 sessions).
- **Session Price:** ~185 NOK per session.
- **Location:** Risenga Terapibasseng (34°C).

### Småbarnssvømming (2 - 5 år)
- **Goal:** Independence, jumping, floating, diving.
- **Price:** 4255 NOK for full semester.
- **Location:** Risenga Terapibasseng.

### Svømmekurs (5 - 10 år)
- **Levels:** Hval, Skilpadde, Pingvin, Selungen, Sel.
- **Goal:** Learn to swim (crawl, backstroke, breaststroke).
- **Price:** 4255 NOK for full semester.
- **Location:** Risenga (Therapy pool or 25m pool depending on level).

## FAQ (Quick Answers)
- **When do courses start?** January and August.
- **Is the water warm?** Yes, 34 degrees Celsius (Therapy pool).
- **Can I join mid-semester?** Yes, if there is space (contact us).
- **Contact Email:** even@idrettsbarna.no
